Good job."},{"lineNumber":94504,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱり男手があると違うわ。","translatedEnglishLine":" It really makes a difference to have a strong man helping."},{"lineNumber":94505,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっという間に終わっちゃった」","translatedEnglishLine":" It was finished in no time.\""},{"lineNumber":94506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ロッキーが来てくれて助かっちゃった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Having Rocky here really helped.\""},{"lineNumber":94507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへへ、お役に立てたなら良かっただ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe, I'm glad I could be of help...\""},{"lineNumber":94508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ロッキー、終わったなら遊ぼうぜー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rocky, if you're done, let's play!\""},{"lineNumber":94509,"originalJapaneseLine":"子供達がロッキーの首筋に飛びついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The children jumped onto Rocky's neck."},{"lineNumber":94510,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あだだ、い、息が止まるだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch, my breath is getting cut off...\""},{"lineNumber":94511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こら、ロッキーは働いた後で疲れてるの！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! Rocky is tired after working!\""},{"lineNumber":94512,"originalJapaneseLine":"「特に、誰かさん達が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Especially since certain people"},{"lineNumber":94513,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手伝わなかった分も働いたからね。","translatedEnglishLine":" worked extra because others didn't help."},{"lineNumber":94514,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さーて、その誰かさんは誰かしらー？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Now then, who could that certain someone Kimchi scolded them,"},{"lineNumber":94517,"originalJapaneseLine":"男の子達は蜘蛛の子を散らすように逃げ出した。","translatedEnglishLine":" the boys scattered like a spider's offspring and ran away."},{"lineNumber":94518,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんな、元気一杯だす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone is full of energy.\""},{"lineNumber":94519,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、今日はロッキーがいるから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, today they're more lively because Rocky is here."},{"lineNumber":94520,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもよりはしゃいでるみたいだけどね」","translatedEnglishLine":" They seem livelier than usual.\""},{"lineNumber":94521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、お茶、淹れたから飲んでって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, I've made some tea, so please have some.\""},{"lineNumber":94522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、頂きますだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, thank you.\""},{"lineNumber":94523,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人で淹れたばかりのお茶を飲む。","translatedEnglishLine":" The two of them drank the freshly brewed tea."},{"lineNumber":94524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、どうなの？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, how is it?"},{"lineNumber":94525,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その……魔軍は……？」","translatedEnglishLine":" That is... the demon army...?\""},{"lineNumber":94526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やっぱり……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As expected..."},{"lineNumber":94527,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争になるそうだす……","translatedEnglishLine":" it seems there will be a war..."},{"lineNumber":94528,"originalJapaneseLine":"　避けられないって……」","translatedEnglishLine":" They say it is unavoidable...\""},{"lineNumber":94529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そっか……嫌だね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see... I don't like that..."},{"lineNumber":94530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずっと戦争戦争ってそんな話ばっかり……」","translatedEnglishLine":" It's just been war, war, and more war talk all the time...\""},{"lineNumber":94531,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ロッキーはどうするの？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What will you do, Rocky?"},{"lineNumber":94532,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争に出る？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Will you go to war?\""},{"lineNumber":94533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのつもりだす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's my intention.\""},{"lineNumber":94534,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":94535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、この辺りはまだ田舎だし、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, this area is still rural,"},{"lineNumber":94536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しばらくは大丈夫だと思うだすよ」","translatedEnglishLine":" so I think it'll be safe for a while.\""},{"lineNumber":94537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……と、ウルザ様が言ってただす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...that's what Urza-sama said.\""},{"lineNumber":94538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah...\""},{"lineNumber":94539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなおらだけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though I'm like this,"},{"lineNumber":94540,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様は一応使ってくれるだ。","translatedEnglishLine":" Lance-sama still uses me, more or less.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなわけにもいかないだ、
ランス様はおらのご主人様だす」
「ランス様ー、待ってくださいだー」
「ロッキーさん……
ランスのせいでひどい目に遭わされかけたのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though you almost suffered terribly because of Lance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでランスにあんな忠誠を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: why are you so loyal to him...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、謎だわ……」
魔軍との戦争が始まる少し前――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little before the war with the demon army began—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーがゼスにある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky was at the Iceframe orphanage in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アイスフレームの孤児院に来ていた。
「キムチさん、これ、運んでおきましただ。
他に仕事はないだか？」
「うん、もうないわ、お疲れ。
やっぱり男手があると違うわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It really makes a difference to have a strong man helping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっという間に終わっちゃった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was finished in no time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ロッキーが来てくれて助かっちゃった」
「えへへへ、お役に立てたなら良かっただ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe, I'm glad I could be of help..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ロッキー、終わったなら遊ぼうぜー！」
子供達がロッキーの首筋に飛びついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The children jumped onto Rocky's neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あだだ、い、息が止まるだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch, my breath is getting cut off..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こら、ロッキーは働いた後で疲れてるの！」
「特に、誰かさん達が
手伝わなかった分も働いたからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: worked extra because others didn't help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さーて、その誰かさんは誰かしらー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, who could that certain someone be?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やべっ、逃げろー！」
キムチに怒られ、
男の子達は蜘蛛の子を散らすように逃げ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the boys scattered like a spider's offspring and ran away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんな、元気一杯だす」
「ふふ、今日はロッキーがいるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, today they're more lively because Rocky is here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもよりはしゃいでるみたいだけどね」
「さて、お茶、淹れたから飲んでって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, I've made some tea, so please have some."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、頂きますだ」
二人で淹れたばかりのお茶を飲む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them drank the freshly brewed tea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、どうなの？
その……魔軍は……？」
「やっぱり……
戦争になるそうだす……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems there will be a war...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 避けられないって……」
「そっか……嫌だね……
ずっと戦争戦争ってそんな話ばっかり……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just been war, war, and more war talk all the time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ロッキーはどうするの？
戦争に出る？」
「そのつもりだす」
「ふーん……」
「あ、この辺りはまだ田舎だし、
しばらくは大丈夫だと思うだすよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I think it'll be safe for a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……と、ウルザ様が言ってただす」
「こんなおらだけど、
ランス様は一応使ってくれるだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance-sama still uses me, more or less."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
